+ ); +}; + +export default DataChart;

Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -0,0 +1,68 @@ +import React from 'react'; +import ReactApexChart from 'react-apexcharts'; + +const DataChart = ({ data }) => { + // Extracting counts from data + const counts = data.map(item => parseInt(item.count, 10)); + + // Extracting statuses from data + const statuses = data.map(item => `${item.status === "1" + ? "New" + : item.status === "2" + ? "Prospect" + : item.status === "3" + ? "Lead" + : item.status === "4" + ? "Retained" + : item.status === "5" + ? "Lost" + : item.status === "6" + ? "Dead" + : item.status === "7" + ? "Working on" + : item.status === "8" + ? "Submitted" + : item.status === "0" + ? "Web" + : "status"}`); + // Generating a palette of colors + const palette = ['#00bcd4', '#4caf50', '#f44336', '#ff9800', '#9c27b0']; + + const options = { + chart: { + width: '100%', // Change width to 100% + type: 'pie', // Change chart type to 'pie' + toolbar: { + show: false // Hide toolbar + } + }, + labels: statuses, // Using extracted statuses as labels + legend: { + position: 'bottom' + }, + plotOptions: { + pie: { + expandOnClick: false + } + }, + theme: { + monochrome: { + enabled: true, + shadeTo: 'light', + shadeIntensity: 0.6 + } + }, + colors: palette // Assigning the color palette to the chart + }; + + return ( +
+
+ +
+
+
+ ); +}; + +export default DataChart;

Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -0,0 +1,86 @@ +import React from 'react'; +import ReactApexChart from 'react-apexcharts'; + +const DataChart = ({ data }) => { + // Extracting counts from data + const counts = data.map(item => parseInt(item.count, 10)); + + // Extracting statuses from data + const statuses = data.map(item => `${item.status === "1" + ? "New" + : item.status === "2" + ? "Prospect" + : item.status === "3" + ? "Lead" + : item.status === "4" + ? "Retained" + : item.status === "5" + ? "Lost" + : item.status === "6" + ? "Dead" + : item.status === "7" + ? "Working on" + : item.status === "8" + ? "Submitted" + : item.status === "0" + ? "Web" + : "status"}`); + // "line" + // | "area" + // | "bar" + // | "pie" + // | "donut" + // | "radialBar" + // | "scatter" + // | "bubble" + // | "heatmap" + // | "candlestick" + // | "boxPlot" + // | "radar" + // | "polarArea" + // | "rangeBar" + // | "rangeArea" + // | "treemap"; +// Generating shades of colors +const generateShades = (count, baseColor) => { + const shades = []; + for (let i = 0; i < count; i++) { + const shade = `rgb(${baseColor.map(c => c + i * 10).join(',')})`; + shades.push(shade); + } + return shades; +}; + +const palette = ['#00bcd4', '#4caf50', '#f44336', '#ff9800', '#9c27b0']; + +const options = { + chart: { + width: '100%', // Change width to 100% + type: 'pie', // Change chart type to 'pie' + toolbar: { + show: false // Hide toolbar + } + }, + labels: statuses, // Using extracted statuses as labels + legend: { + position: 'bottom' + }, + plotOptions: { + pie: { + expandOnClick: false + } + }, + colors: palette.flatMap((baseColor, index) => generateShades(counts[index], baseColor)), +}; + + return ( +
+
+ +
+
+
+ ); +}; + +export default DataChart;
